assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All authors have completed the ICMJE uniform disclosure form at ExternalRef removed and declare: TAD had financial support (grant) from Fondazione Regionale per la Ricerca Biomedica (Milan, Italy). The other authors had no support from any organization for the submitted work. All authors had no financial relationships with any organizations that might have an interest in the submitted work in the previous 3 years; no other relationships or activities that could appear to have influenced the submitted work.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This case series is part of a broader research program on lung adenocarcinoma, for which a biobank of lung tissue and extracted nucleic acids is maintained at Fondazione IRCCS Istituto Nazionale dei Tumori, Milan (previously described in [CitationRef removed]). Methods for tissue collection, storage and nucleic acid extraction, and information about ethical approval and patients’ informed consent have already been reported [CitationRef removed].

assertion.label: Free to read
assertion.name: free
assertion.value: This content has been made available to all.

funder.name: Fondazione Regionale Ricerca Biomedica (FRRB), Milan, Italy.
